title: INTEGRATION_model_editor_undo test fails to download models on fresh machine

content.raw:
The `INTEGRATION_model_editor_undo` test fails to run (#1861), but I've also noticed that it fails to download some models for the `ModelPluginDeletionByContextMenu` subtest when all tests are run at once and the `~/.gazebo/models` folder hasn't yet been populated:

~~~
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.17.0.4
[Err] [ModelDatabase.cc:414] Unable to download model[model://submarine_sinking]
[Err] [SystemPaths.cc:412] File or path does not exist[""]
Error [parser.cc:584] Unable to find uri[model://submarine_sinking]
[Err] [ModelDatabase.cc:414] Unable to download model[model://submarine]
[Err] [SystemPaths.cc:412] File or path does not exist[""]
Error [parser.cc:584] Unable to find uri[model://submarine]
[Err] [ModelDatabase.cc:414] Unable to download model[model://submarine_buoyant]
[Err] [SystemPaths.cc:412] File or path does not exist[""]
Error [parser.cc:584] Unable to find uri[model://submarine_buoyant]
[Wrn] [ModelCreator.cc:569] Couldn't find SDF for submarine_buoyant. Not loading it.
FAIL!  : ModelEditorUndoTest::ModelPluginDeletionByContextMenu() Compared values are not the same
   Actual   (pluginsItem->childCount()): 1
   Expected (2)                        : 2
   Loc: [/home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/test/integration/model_editor_undo.cc(726)]
SharePercentChange[-0.0401197] ShareMaxPercentChange[2]
ResPercentChange[0.0484457]ResMaxPercentChange[5]
~~~

If I run the test individually, then it passes.

~~~
$ test/integration/INTEGRATION_model_editor_undo ModelPluginDeletionByContextMenu
********* Start testing of ModelEditorUndoTest *********
Config: Using QtTest library 5.5.1, Qt 5.5.1 (x86_64-little_endian-lp64 shared (dynamic) release build; by GCC 5.4.0 20160609)
PASS   : ModelEditorUndoTest::initTestCase()
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.17.0.4
[Wrn] [ModelDatabase.cc:340] Getting models from[http://gazebosim.org/models/]. This may take a few seconds.
[Msg] Undo deleting plugin [buoyancy]
[Msg] Redo deleting plugin [buoyancy]
[Msg] Undo deleting plugin [buoyancy]
[Msg] Redo deleting plugin [buoyancy]
[Msg] Undo deleting plugin [buoyancy]
[Msg] Redo deleting plugin [buoyancy]
SharePercentChange[0.808239] ShareMaxPercentChange[2]
ResPercentChange[2.72803]ResMaxPercentChange[5]
PASS   : ModelEditorUndoTest::ModelPluginDeletionByContextMenu()
PASS   : ModelEditorUndoTest::cleanupTestCase()
Totals: 3 passed, 0 failed, 0 skipped, 0 blacklisted
********* Finished testing of ModelEditorUndoTest *********
~~~

Perhaps the `ModelDatabase` Singleton isn't getting properly re-initialized when the tests are all run together?
content.html:
The INTEGRATION_model_editor_undo test fails to run (#1861), but I've also noticed that it fails to download some models for the ModelPluginDeletionByContextMenu subtest when all tests are run at once and the ~/.gazebo/models folder hasn't yet been populated:

[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.17.0.4
[Err] [ModelDatabase.cc:414] Unable to download model[model://submarine_sinking]
[Err] [SystemPaths.cc:412] File or path does not exist[""]
Error [parser.cc:584] Unable to find uri[model://submarine_sinking]
[Err] [ModelDatabase.cc:414] Unable to download model[model://submarine]
[Err] [SystemPaths.cc:412] File or path does not exist[""]
Error [parser.cc:584] Unable to find uri[model://submarine]
[Err] [ModelDatabase.cc:414] Unable to download model[model://submarine_buoyant]
[Err] [SystemPaths.cc:412] File or path does not exist[""]
Error [parser.cc:584] Unable to find uri[model://submarine_buoyant]
[Wrn] [ModelCreator.cc:569] Couldn't find SDF for submarine_buoyant. Not loading it.
FAIL!  : ModelEditorUndoTest::ModelPluginDeletionByContextMenu() Compared values are not the same
   Actual   (pluginsItem->childCount()): 1
   Expected (2)                        : 2
   Loc: [/home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/test/integration/model_editor_undo.cc(726)]
SharePercentChange[-0.0401197] ShareMaxPercentChange[2]
ResPercentChange[0.0484457]ResMaxPercentChange[5]

If I run the test individually, then it passes.

$ test/integration/INTEGRATION_model_editor_undo ModelPluginDeletionByContextMenu
********* Start testing of ModelEditorUndoTest *********
Config: Using QtTest library 5.5.1, Qt 5.5.1 (x86_64-little_endian-lp64 shared (dynamic) release build; by GCC 5.4.0 20160609)
PASS   : ModelEditorUndoTest::initTestCase()
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.17.0.4
[Wrn] [ModelDatabase.cc:340] Getting models from[http://gazebosim.org/models/]. This may take a few seconds.
[Msg] Undo deleting plugin [buoyancy]
[Msg] Redo deleting plugin [buoyancy]
[Msg] Undo deleting plugin [buoyancy]
[Msg] Redo deleting plugin [buoyancy]
[Msg] Undo deleting plugin [buoyancy]
[Msg] Redo deleting plugin [buoyancy]
SharePercentChange[0.808239] ShareMaxPercentChange[2]
ResPercentChange[2.72803]ResMaxPercentChange[5]
PASS   : ModelEditorUndoTest::ModelPluginDeletionByContextMenu()
PASS   : ModelEditorUndoTest::cleanupTestCase()
Totals: 3 passed, 0 failed, 0 skipped, 0 blacklisted
********* Finished testing of ModelEditorUndoTest *********

Perhaps the ModelDatabase Singleton isn't getting properly re-initialized when the tests are all run together?
